long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Got a genius idea or a feature you'd love to see? Meet Doran, the Chrome Extension that lets you share your thoughts straight from your browser! No more complicated steps‚Äîjust a simple way to make your voice heard.

Doran bridges the gap between your ideas and reality. We're changing the game by making idea-sharing effortless. Whether you're a tech whiz or just love good software, Doran empowers you to shape the digital world, one idea at a time.

Why Use Doran:

üöÄ Simple Submission: Click the Doran icon in your browser's top bar, and boom, you're ready to share. No more digging through websites or forms.

üîó Connect Instantly: Set up Doran with your unique API Key from the Doran dashboard. Stay connected without the fuss.

‚è±Ô∏è Real-time Sharing: No waiting around. Your ideas shoot straight to the Doran platform, keeping everyone in the loop.

üåê Smooth Integration: Doran fits right into your browsing routine. Submit ideas without interrupting what you're doing.

üí° User-Friendly: No tech chops are needed. Doran's extension is designed for everyone, whether you're a pro or a newbie.

How It Works:
1. Get Your API Key: Grab your API Key from the Doran dashboard‚Äîyour ticket to the extension.
2. Extension Setup: Plug in your API Key, and presto, Doran is ready to roll. No headaches, we promise.
3. Share Instantly: Have an idea? Click the Doran icon, type it, hit submit, and you're done!
